features.name: Market Research service health check
features.description: GET /health returns 200 with status=ok for Market Research service

features.name: Market Research response time < 2s
features.description: Health endpoint responds within 2000ms

features.name: Market Research CORS headers present
features.description: Response includes Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

features.name: Market Research service version returned
features.description: Health response includes service version string

features.name: Market Research uptime reported
features.description: Health response includes uptime or started_at field

features.name: Market Research valid auth token accepted
features.description: Request with valid Bearer token returns 200, not 401

features.name: Market Research missing auth returns 401
features.description: Request without Authorization header returns 401

features.name: Market Research invalid token returns 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer invalid' returns 401

features.name: Market Research malformed Bearer returns 400 or 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer ' (empty) returns 4xx

features.name: Market Research token in query param rejected
features.description: Token passed as ?token= without Bearer header is rejected

features.name: Market Research auth error body has message field
features.description: 401 response body includes message or error field

features.name: Market Research OPTIONS preflight passes without auth
features.description: OPTIONS request returns 200 without auth header

features.name: Market Research auth bypass attempt blocked
features.description: Request with X-Forwarded-For spoofing returns same 401

features.name: Search Instagram posts by keyword
features.description: POST /api/research/instagram/search with keyword returns posts array

features.name: Search Twitter posts by keyword
features.description: POST /api/research/twitter/search with keyword returns posts array

features.name: Search TikTok posts by keyword
features.description: POST /api/research/tiktok/search with keyword returns posts array

features.name: Search Threads posts by keyword
features.description: POST /api/research/threads/search with keyword returns posts array

features.name: Get top creators for niche
features.description: POST /api/research/top-creators with niche returns creators ranked by engagement

features.name: Get cross-platform trends
features.description: GET /api/research/trends returns top niches across platforms

features.name: Run competitor research job
features.description: POST /api/research/competitor with niche starts async job, returns job_id

features.name: Poll competitor research job
features.description: GET /api/research/jobs/:job_id returns status + partial results

features.name: Get engagement stats for post
features.description: GET /api/research/post?url=... returns likes, views, comments, shares

features.name: Get niche performance summary
features.description: GET /api/research/niches/:niche returns avg_views, top_formats

features.name: Research returns post author handle
features.description: Each post object includes author.handle field

features.name: Research returns post URL
features.description: Each post object includes url field

features.name: Filter research by date range
features.description: POST with date_from/date_to filters returns only recent posts

features.name: Filter by min engagement
features.description: POST with min_engagement=1000 returns only high-engagement posts

features.name: Get trending hashtags
features.description: GET /api/research/hashtags/:platform returns trending array

features.name: Batch keyword search
features.description: POST /api/research/batch with keywords[] returns combined results

features.name: Research result saved to Supabase
features.description: After search, result appears in actp_content_performance table

features.name: Get niche resonance score
features.description: GET /api/research/resonance/:niche/:platform returns score 0-100

features.name: Get top posts for keyword
features.description: POST /api/research/top-posts returns posts sorted by engagement desc

features.name: Get creator engagement score
features.description: GET /api/research/creator/:handle returns total_engagement, avg_per_post

features.name: Market Research missing required body field returns 400
features.description: POST without required field returns 400 with field name in error

features.name: Market Research empty string body returns 400
features.description: POST with empty string for required text field returns 400

features.name: Market Research null value in required field returns 400
features.description: POST with null for required field returns 400 with message

features.name: Market Research wrong content-type returns 415 or 400
features.description: POST with text/plain instead of application/json returns 4xx

features.name: Market Research extremely long string (>10000 chars) handled
features.description: POST with 10001 char string returns 400 or truncates gracefully

features.name: Market Research SQL injection attempt in text field rejected
features.description: Text containing SQL keywords is sanitized, not executed

features.name: Market Research XSS payload in text field is escaped
features.description: Text with <script> tags is returned safely escaped

features.name: Market Research service down → 503 or circuit open
features.description: When downstream unavailable, returns 503 with retry-after header

features.name: Market Research timeout returns 504 with message
features.description: Request that takes >30s returns 504 gateway timeout

features.name: Market Research duplicate action returns idempotent result
features.description: Sending same DM twice returns success without duplicate

features.name: Market Research invalid enum value in body returns 400
features.description: POST with platform='invalid' returns 400 listing valid values

features.name: Market Research error response always JSON
features.description: All 4xx/5xx responses have Content-Type: application/json

features.name: Market Research stack trace not exposed in production
features.description: 500 error response does NOT include stack trace

features.name: Market Research connection refused returns retryable error
features.description: When port not available, error includes retryable=true flag

features.name: Market Research method not allowed returns 405
features.description: GET on POST-only endpoint returns 405 with Allow header

features.name: Market Research unicode emoji in payload works
features.description: Unicode emoji 😀🔥 in text field is preserved

features.name: Market Research RTL text (Arabic/Hebrew) handled
features.description: Arabic text in body is returned correctly

features.name: Market Research newline chars in text preserved
features.description: Text with \n is stored and returned with newlines intact

features.name: Market Research zero-width space character handled
features.description: Text with zero-width space doesn't crash processing

features.name: Market Research URL with query params in text preserved
features.description: URL with ? and & in text is not altered

features.name: Market Research very short text (1 char) works
features.description: Single character text in body accepted

features.name: Market Research duplicate consecutive spaces normalized
features.description: Multiple spaces in text handled without error

features.name: Market Research numeric username as string works
features.description: Username '123456' as string is accepted

features.name: Market Research pagination limit=0 returns empty or default
features.description: limit=0 returns empty array or default page

features.name: Market Research pagination page=9999 returns empty array
features.description: Out-of-range page returns empty array, not 404

features.name: Market Research rate limit headers present on responses
features.description: Response includes X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining

features.name: Market Research 429 returned when limit exceeded
features.description: Exceeding configured rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After

features.name: Market Research Retry-After header is integer seconds
features.description: Retry-After value is parseable integer > 0

features.name: Market Research rate limit resets after window
features.description: After wait period, subsequent requests succeed again

features.name: Market Research concurrent requests handled safely
features.description: 5 simultaneous requests don't cause 500 errors

features.name: Market Research daily cap tracked per account
features.description: GET /rate-limits returns per-account daily_used field

features.name: Market Research force=true bypasses active-hours guard
features.description: POST with force=true during inactive hours still processes

features.name: Market Research DM/action stored in Supabase
features.description: After successful action, row appears in relevant Supabase table

features.name: Market Research no duplicate rows on retry
features.description: Retrying same action doesn't create duplicate DB row

features.name: Market Research timestamps are ISO 8601
features.description: created_at column in stored rows is valid ISO 8601 string

features.name: Market Research platform field set correctly
features.description: Stored row has platform field set to correct platform name

features.name: Market Research contact upserted in crm_contacts
features.description: New user interaction upserts record in crm_contacts table

features.name: Market Research conversation synced to crm_conversations
features.description: Conversation appears in crm_conversations after DM sync

features.name: Market Research message synced to crm_messages
features.description: Individual messages appear in crm_messages after sync

features.name: Market Research RLS policy allows service reads
features.description: Supabase SELECT with service role key succeeds

features.name: Market Research SELECT returns rows with all required columns
features.description: Query result includes id, created_at, platform, content

features.name: Market Research failed action NOT stored
features.description: When action fails (success=false), no row is inserted

features.name: Market Research AI message generation returns string
features.description: POST /ai-message or /suggest-reply returns non-empty string

features.name: Market Research AI output respects platform char limit
features.description: AI-generated text for this platform fits platform char limit

features.name: Market Research AI model field returned in response
features.description: AI response includes model_used field

features.name: Market Research AI error falls back gracefully
features.description: When Claude API fails, returns fallback text or 503

features.name: Market Research AI output is on-topic for niche
features.description: Generated message for solopreneur niche mentions relevant terms

features.name: Market Research AI scoring returns 0-100 integer
features.description: Prospect/content score is integer in [0, 100] range

features.name: Market Research AI reasoning field non-empty
features.description: Score response includes non-empty reasoning or signals array

features.name: Market Research AI structured output is valid JSON
features.description: When model returns structured JSON, it parses without error

features.name: Market Research MCP initialize handshake completes
features.description: Send initialize → receive result with protocolVersion

features.name: Market Research tools/list returns valid schema array
features.description: Each tool has name, description, inputSchema fields

features.name: Market Research tool call returns result content array
features.description: Valid tool call returns result.content[] with type field

features.name: Market Research tool error returns structured error
features.description: Invalid tool params returns isError=true with message

features.name: Market Research MCP over stdio doesn't crash on empty line
features.description: Empty newline in stdio stream doesn't crash server

features.name: Market Research tool result is serializable JSON
features.description: Tool result can be JSON.stringify'd without circular refs

features.name: Market Research sequential tool calls maintain session
features.description: Call tool A then tool B in same session — both succeed

features.name: Market Research unknown tool returns method-not-found
features.description: Call with unknown toolName returns -32601 or error

features.name: Market Research tool timeout returns error gracefully
features.description: Tool that takes >30s returns timeout error, not hang

features.name: Market Research MCP server restarts cleanly after crash
features.description: After killing and restarting, first tool call succeeds

features.name: Market Research session created with unique ID
features.description: Create session returns unique sessionId string

features.name: Market Research session persists between requests
features.description: Two requests with same sessionId share browser state

features.name: Market Research expired session returns 404
features.description: Request with old/expired sessionId returns 404 or error

features.name: Market Research close session frees resources
features.description: Close session endpoint confirms session removed

features.name: Market Research list sessions returns active sessions
features.description: List sessions returns currently active session IDs

features.name: Market Research p95 response time < 5s for core ops
features.description: 95th percentile of 20 sequential calls is under 5000ms

features.name: Market Research 10 concurrent requests all succeed
features.description: 10 simultaneous requests return 200 with no 500 errors

features.name: Market Research large payload (50 items) handled
features.description: Response with 50+ items in array is returned correctly

features.name: Market Research streaming response works if supported
features.description: If SSE/streaming supported, first chunk received within 2s

features.name: Market Research cold start after idle < 10s
features.description: First request after 5min idle returns within 10s
